description.english: Save 100 fish in at least 20 different levels (no additional tools allowed)
description.german: Rette 100 Fische in mindestens 20 verschiedenen Levels (keine zusätzlichen Werkzeuge erlaubt).
description.french: Sauver 100 poissons sur au moins 20 niveaux (sans acheter d'outil supplémentaire)
description.italian: Salva 100 pesci in almeno 20 livelli differenti (nessuno strumento aggiuntivo consentito)
description.spanish: Salva a 100 peces en al menos 20 niveles distintos (no se permiten herramientas adicionales)
description.russian: Спасите 100 рыб как минимум на 20 различных уровнях (без дополнительных инструментов)
description.portuguese: Salva 100 peixes em pelo menos 20 níveis diferentes (não são permitidas ferramentas adicionais)

description.russian: Пройдите 20 уровней подряд в режиме выживания
description.portuguese: Termina 20 níveis de seguida no modo Sobrevivência
